headline: Procter & Gamble Maintains Outperform Rating Amid Organizational Restructuring
summary: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) ranks among the best FMCG stocks to buy. On June 27, Evercore ISI gave The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) a vote of confidence, reaffirming its Outperform rating and $190 price target for the consumer products behemoth. The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is going through an organizational restructuring […]
